## Description {#details}

## Public Static Functions

### collectControlConditions() {#a866163a9dbd27133c221fc2569333ddb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const std::optional&lt; ControlConditions &gt; ControlConditions::collectControlConditions (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; BB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp; Dominator, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp; DT, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/postdominatortree">PostDominatorTree</a> &amp; PDT, unsigned MaxLookup=6)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return a <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codemoverutils-cpp-/controlconditions">ControlConditions</a> which stores all conditions required to execute <code>BB</code> from <code>Dominator</code>.

If <code>MaxLookup</code> is non-zero, it limits the number of conditions to collect. Return std::nullopt if not all conditions are collected successfully, or we hit the limit.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codemoverutils-cpp/#l00063">63</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/codemoverutils-cpp">CodeMoverUtils.cpp</a>.
